english_example_sentence: If we buy a new house, our family would be very comfortable.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы купили новый дом, нашей семье было бы очень комфортно.
turkish_example_sentence: Yeni bir ev alsak, ailemiz çok rahat ederiz.
